fields.summary: CTAS query removes leading underscore from column names with CBO

fields.summary: CTAS query can not use `_c` in the prefix of the column alias

[~pxiong], thanks for pointing it out. I think they should be complementary: this one deals with the way of fixing issue with duplicates, while I would just like to get the restriction of starting "_" for column names away.
